mng: to put, to place, to release, to free, to let go, to let out, to set off (fireworks)

exm.mng: to bloom, to open, to be open (to the public), to open up (to the outside), to be open-minded, unrestrained by convention, unconstrained in one's sexuality
to feel relieved, to feel reassured, to be at ease
to broadcast, to announce over loudspeakers
to renounce, to abandon, to give up
